source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_00<tab>Fibubb Gah seeks aid to replenish the Brotherhood's stock of healing salves.
target: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_00<tab>灰の陣営のフィブブ・ガーは、冒険者に頼みがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_01<tab>Fibubb Gah explains that a true warrior needs to be as concerned with the arts of healing as with the arts of war. Seek out succulents within Zanr'ak and harvest their rejuvenating sap.
target: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_01<tab>フィブブ・ガーの依頼を受けた。ザンラクの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E902301 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88F201 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained a supply of rejuvenating sap. Return to the Ring of Ash and deliver the healing salve to Fibubb Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88F201 /var>を入手した。灰の陣営の「フィブブ・ガー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88F201 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_03<tab>You have delivered the rejuvenating sap to Fibubb Gah. The proud warrior commends your efforts, claiming that a Brotherhood soldier would sooner die in battle than on a sickbed.
target: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_03<tab>フィブブ・ガーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88F201 /var>を渡した。フィブブ・ガーは冒険者の働きをねぎらった。彼らが戦いを続けられるよう、またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_TODO_00<tab>Obtain vials of rejuvenating sap from succulents in Zanr'ak.
target: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_TODO_00<tab>ザンラクの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E902301 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88F201 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the rejuvenating sap to Fibubb Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_TODO_01<tab>フィブブ・ガーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88F201 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_001<tab>We of the Brotherhood of Ash are proud soldiers all. Yet even the greatest soldier can starve without sustenance, or be crippled by injury.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_001我ら「灰の一党」は、一騎当千の兵（つわもの）なり。
……されど、飢不択食。
我らとて食事もすれば怪我もする。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_002<tab>We bear our battle wounds as badges of honor, but a festering cut can take one's life as surely as the blade of one's foe. A true warrior neglects not the arts of healing.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_002刻まれた傷は戦士の勲章。
しかれども、傷治らなく死に至れば、これすなわち敗北。
癒しの術を軽んじる輩に、真なる戦士なし。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_003<tab>My task for you, honored ally, is simple yet needful: gather from the desert plants of Zanr'ak the rejuvenating sap we use to salve our hurts.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_003そこで強き者よ、実践躬行。
ザンラクの大地に生えるより、
丸薬の元となる「」を集めよ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_004<tab>Though our foes make no use of such remedies, they will nevertheless be loath to relinquish them to you. Have a care you do not sustain such injuries that you fail to return!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_004真の戦士にあらざるザンラクの一党に、
癒しの術を譲る道理もなし……。
迅速なる収集で、汝の真なる戦士たるを示さん。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_011<tab>Gather the clear sap of the Zanr'ak desert plants, and aid us in keeping our warriors hale.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_011ザンラクの大地に生えるより、
丸薬の元となる「」集めてはもらえぬか。
迅速なる収集で、汝の真なる戦士たるを示さん。

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_021<tab>Welcome, honored ally. Have you the sap we require?
target:
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_021御苦労であった、強き者よ。
「」は集め終わりしか？

source: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_022<tab>Yes, this will allow our wounded to return to the front lines of battle where a glorious death awaits. No true warrior wishes to wither away on a sickbed...
target:
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_022……確かに「」。
不撓不屈、これあらば、我らが戦を続けること難くなし。
我、貴公の働きに、真なる戦士の資質を見出さん。
